fact: Water boils at 100 degrees Celsius at sea level.
The Amazon River is the largest river by discharge volume of water in the world.
The first computer virus was created in 1983 and was called Elk Cloner.
The human body contains approximately 37.2 trillion cells.
The Sun accounts for about 99.86% of the mass in our solar system.
Pi is an irrational number, meaning its decimal representation never ends or repeats.
Gold is one of the least reactive chemical elements and does not tarnish.
The printing press was invented by Johannes Gutenberg around 1440.
